duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish packaging and processing specifications for new product introductions and cost savings
Lead medium to high-risk Green Belt projects with product and logistics groups for continuous improvement and cost savings
Provide NPI support to develop packaging solutions to machine components
Design for transport efficiency and packaging optimization for OS&D damage reduction
Research and analyze supplier design proposals to determine time and cost feasibility
Create custom packaging concepts using 3D modeling software such as Pro-E

education_certification.credential: Bachelor or Master of Science Degree in Industrial Engineering, Packaging, Mechanical Engineering, or equivalent degree, 2+ years of Packaging industrial design experience, 1+ years project management experience
